short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides an estimated cost for your Amazon auto-deliveries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy Chrome extension designed to provide you with an estimated total price for your Amazon subscription orders (auto-deliveries). This tool helps you gain a better understanding of the overall cost of your Amazon subscribe & save deliveries, making it easier to manage and plan your expenses. Please note that the prices displayed by the Amazon Subscription Estimator are only estimates, and should not be taken as definitive or accurate totals.
